website_summaries.verdict: With a texture that’s manageable even when dry, this freeze-dried dog food is ideal for out-of-the-package treats or as a meal for dogs with dental issues.
pros: Developed to meet the nutritional needs of all life stages
Recipe containing muscle meat, organs, ground bones, and produce delivers a well-balanced meal that’s rich in protein, vitamins, and digestive fiber
Free of antibiotics, hormones, grains, and gluten
cons: Very small breeds might still need to have water added to the nuggets

customer_reviews.title: The ingredients are super healthy. It's expensive
customer_reviews.text: My little dog, who has turned up her nose at every kibble ever made and isn't impressed by canned dog food, loves this food. She'll eat it by itself, mixed with liquid, or with meat and vegetables. If you have a picky eater and worry that it's not getting the nutrition it needs, you might try this. The ingredients are super healthy. It's expensive, but my little girl doesn't eat much in a day so it works out for us. Don't know about a big dog though. One could go through this package in a day or so. It lasts me a couple of weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Bently52

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff! I take like 6 or 7 and crumble them up over 1/4 cup of dog kibble and water twice a day for my 7 lb yorkie. It doesn't smell bad, in fact it kind of makes the kibble stink less. My dog loves it, and I can't stop buying it! Word to the wise, it's only $19.99 at Mud Bay in Portland, so check your local boutique pet store. That way you can squeeze the cubes for freshness. Sometimes they're super dry and hard instead of soft and crumbly.
customer_reviews.author: MoJo Dono

customer_reviews.title: Helpful
customer_reviews.text: Love NN I usually buy raw turkey from Northwest Naturals. But I would constantly forget to thaw it before feeding it to the pups so I found that they sell freeze dried at Amazon (I haven’t found freeze dried at any store). So now when I forget (I’m getting better at not forgetting) I simply give them the freeze dried chicken. Which they love, it’s easy and fast to feed. Simply put warm water on the amount you are going to feed and you could break the nuggets apart with a fork (I use a fork). And it is good to serve.
customer_reviews.author: Someone

customer_reviews.title: Healthy, and they love it!
customer_reviews.text: My two 5lb. toy poodles LOVE this. Their mouths are so tiny that they can't "work" the nuggets, so I grind the whole package in a dry-mix blender. I measure their 13g serving (the equivalent to the # of nuggets they should have) and mix it with water for each meal to keep them from getting dehydrated in our Florida heat. The only problem with the food? They just want more at each meal!
customer_reviews.author: Raina

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and Versatile Food
customer_reviews.text: I love this food. I have a really picky and finicky eater, so I throw the nuggets into the blender and make a fine powder. Then I sprinkle this on her food when I feed her. She eats eveytime now. This is an excellent product with excellent quality. I subscribe to this and get it delivered monthly. I recommend this to anyone!!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Allen

customer_reviews.title: Good food for your Dog
customer_reviews.text: My dogs enjoy this raw food as a supplement, treat, or full meal replacement. Easy to make and obviously great tasting as evidenced by my dogs. Comes in a variety of flavors. The only reason for not giving 5 stars for the value and thickness is it is a tad more expensive through this seller($3-4)than what I expected/usually pay at my local supplier(was closed temporarily during the Covid-19 crisis, has since gone out of business) and much of the chunks were already smashed in the package.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Massei

customer_reviews.title: More dust than solid food
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I've bought these. It is one of the few dog foods both our pets like. The first bag was great, almost no dust, all solid particles. However, this shipment was a downer as so much of the food had crumbled into dust that the bag's usable content was probably less than half. At this price, that's a problem. BTW, the question of "flavor" in the review strikes me as strange considering I'm not the one eating it. But the dogs like it so four stars for flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Inglesby

customer_reviews.title: My picky Chihuahua loves this food!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this because my dog loves it! My Chihuahuas has a tiny mouth, so i soak it in hot water, then squash it with a fork, making a thick paste. Way easier for them to eat like that! Light bag, transports easily, lots in the bag. My five pound dog eats 5 nuggets wetted in the morning & 5 nuggets at night. Great, high quality food!!
customer_reviews.author: Kay A

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE Northwest Naturals!  (and so does my dog!)
customer_reviews.text: Northwest Naturals is the best food! My dog loves it and I feel good about such quality ingredients. It is great that it includes bone and organs, all the benefits of raw, but without the salmonella/listera/bacteria concerns!
customer_reviews.author: MOD

customer_reviews.title: My Dogs Love These!
customer_reviews.text: My dogs are picky about treats. Forget the biscuits, they are meat eaters. We have bought other freeze dried products, but when I read the reviews on these natural raw, freeze dried checked nuggets, I decided to try them. I really like that they are made in the USA. I give my dogs 1-2 per day as a snack and they come running when they hear me open the bag. There are quite a few of those little square nuggets in the bag, so I expect that it will last for quite a while. If my dogs could use the computer, they would be re-ordering them right now.
customer_reviews.author: S. Rigby

customer_reviews.title: Gave diarrhea and couldn't return both bags. Maybe they were bad batch or not so good at all!
customer_reviews.text: We tried on and off with one bag, but my dog has a very loose stool with the food. She always has a diarrhea whenever she eat this brand raw food. She always had other raw brands They were very expensive, but I cannot return two bags anymore or use them either...waste of money:-/
customer_reviews.author: YF

customer_reviews.title: Picky Dog
customer_reviews.text: My dog eats Northwest Naturals Raw along with a typical dog food. Not only does he eat his food BETTER when I crumble two on top (he doesn't eat much because he is a Chihuahua), but he has also figured out which jar I keep his freeze-dried food in and will sit and wait until he knows I have it in his bowl! The Chicken and Salmon Recipe are my go-to, but I am confident the other varieties would be just as well accepted.
customer_reviews.author: ridgwayh1

customer_reviews.title: We are in love with these morsels!
customer_reviews.text: Ohhhhh! How my doggy loves this morsels of love. I actually bought these to give them to my imperial shih tzu as a treat on top of her dinner. So every morning and every night, I cut these morsels in 4 and lay them on top of her meal. She loves them more than you could believe. Pretty expensive but anything for my baby girl!
customer_reviews.author: Robin C.

customer_reviews.title: It's sweet to watch her
customer_reviews.text: I use 4 of these on top of both meals for my furry angel. She savors these toppers, even picking them off the top and one by one, taking them to a special corner in the living room where she's sure no one will get it from her (not that anyone in the house would try). It's sweet to watch her. This is a staple for our dog. We re-order just about every 3 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I've bought this product before but this batch was like it had been swept up from the floor. Very disappointing quality - seller didn't respond.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Miller

customer_reviews.title: Like Dog Crack
customer_reviews.text: Dog goes batsh*t crazy for them. He suddenly remembers how to shake, be quiet, sit, lay down and a few other tricks I didn’t even know he learned before I got him. Expensive for a treat, but totally worth it and can be used as a meal for little dogs (price wise). For his weight, he would finish a packet in about two days (almost 100 pounds).
customer_reviews.author: Angela Lovewell

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent quqlity - this time arrived totally crushed powder, not as nuggets
customer_reviews.text: Product has been variable in quality, having ordered a number of times - sometimes nuggets are fresh and crisp, sometimes have seemed soggier - this time it arrived as basically a bag of dust, rather than intact morsels. Works for my purposes at this stage in my dog's life, but definitely not what I would have hoped for.
customer_reviews.author: A.E.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Latest Update: There is something wrong with the Chicken recipe. I bought two bags and they smell different than the last ones and my dog won't eat them. It is a putrid smell. I called Northwest Naturals and left a message, but no one has called me back yet. Don't buy this until they get the recipe fixed or quality control in place! Old review: My ShihTzu loves this food! :-)
customer_reviews.author: D. Marlow

customer_reviews.title: My dog will not eat the Beef Recipe, it ...
customer_reviews.text: My dog will not eat the Beef Recipe, it is hard as a rock--she can't chew it. the expiration date is 10-19-20-2019. She really likes the Chicken and Salmon recipe. She'd rather starve than eat the Beef. Any ideas!
customer_reviews.author: Peggy Mindt

customer_reviews.title: Dog approved!
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love these! I also buy this same brand of dog food in the form of raw/frozen from the pet food store. This freeze dried version is much less messy, and less stinky to serve then the fresh/frozen version. And my dogs love both.
customer_reviews.author: Wild Rose

customer_reviews.title: excellent (but very expensive) dog food
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this food SO much - we usually buy it from the local pet store (for the same price) but occasionally order. The local pet store is run by an extraordinarily knowledgeable dog dietitian, and she considers this to be one of the highest quality foods available. And that's not all - m y dog is crazy for it. When he sees the bag come out of the cabinet, he runs out and barks excitedly until dinner is ready.
customer_reviews.author: Joelle

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love it!
customer_reviews.text: Mine came whole and fresh with very little powder at the bottom. Even my small breed picky eaters gobble this down! I was going to make the adjustment to new food slowly but accidentally gave the wrong dog a whole serving and had zero stomach upset. This has been a life saver for my picky eater!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love this good but unfortunately every time I order it ...
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love this good but unfortunately every time I order it from Amazon, the bags come half full of crumbs instead of nuggets. This is a photo of a bag from Amazon next to a bag from our local pet food store Chuck & Dons. The bag on the left is from Amazon, the one on the right is from the local store.
customer_reviews.author: Andi

customer_reviews.title: Versatile!
customer_reviews.text: I took the dust at the bottom and mixed it with quality chicken broth and made frozen treats. I use the cubes as treats and/or toppers over kibble and broth. My dog loves the beef.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Weighs nothing! Great for extended hikes
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for an extended hiking trip (3 days) and the reduction in weight alone made it SO worth it! Seriously it weighs almost nothing and carrying dog food can be a LOT of weight in your pack. Add to that my dog absolutely loving it and I will surely buy it again. I did find a bag almost twice the size for less money at a local feed store so I'm not sure what that was about? But still, it's a great product. Made sure our dog had plenty of water when he ate.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Sheffler

customer_reviews.title: STAY AWAY FROM SELLER!
customer_reviews.text: We got the dog food that we use all the time and inside of the bag I found this rotten looking but hard as a rock terribly smelling bits. They looked disgusting. Guessing the buyer doesn’t check the quality but I’ve never seen anything like that. The expiration date is ok but the dogs are without this food.
customer_reviews.author: serissa2000

customer_reviews.title: Bag too small
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love this food, but it only comes in a 12 oz. bag. With my two large dogs I can only get 3 meals from one bag. Way too expensive! Wish they made a large, less expensive bag. Had to switch to another brand that was more cost effective.
customer_reviews.author: Suz

customer_reviews.title: Our dog loves this!
customer_reviews.text: my dog loves your product. for a 100# dog he does the 'happy dance' every meal & it is for the added treat. if we forget to put it in with his regular food, we get 'stink eye' like we forgot something. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Julie E

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this accidently instead of the cat one. My cat loves her product so I am assuming that the dog version would be just as good. This is a good alternative to feeding fresh raw and gives the benefits.
customer_reviews.author: Rae P.

customer_reviews.title: dog loves this
customer_reviews.text: While the pup has kibble to freely eat all day, he especially loves this with his morning nibbles. Whatever I put out, he eats this first. I always add water, but often before it has had a chance to soak anything up, he's wolfed it down.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa D Silverman

customer_reviews.title: my dogs love love love them
customer_reviews.text: Not what I expected but my dogs love love love them. I have 2 small dogs. My one dog at first was not too sure about this food, I think it was a texture issue. But once she figure it out she loved this food. I read that others added water, didn't try it but I am sure it would have helped. My cat, who is extremely picky, love this food as well. Yes, it is on the expensive side, but it is sooooo worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Bessey

customer_reviews.title: Great food topper or treat for picky eaters
customer_reviews.text: Works great for picky eaters or for camping trips where weight is key. My only wish is they would create a lower protein option for elderly dogs that often need encouragement to eat but can’t handle high protein meals.
customer_reviews.author: runcix

customer_reviews.title: Crumbs
customer_reviews.text: When I first started buying these, my dog loved them but now when I’ve ordered them, they are all crumbs and they’re already fallen apart when they arrive. I wish they wouldn’t be all crumbs and dust or I’d keep ordering them.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Lowder

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful food!
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful nutritious food. I crumble it and use it as a topper over other food that is no as tasty to my dog. He eats any food up that has this on top of it and gets great nutrition at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: penny bowers

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: My yorkies love this food. They pick it out first when I add it to their other brand of freeze dried food and carry it around til they finally eat it. They even fight over it.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love this!
customer_reviews.text: When my fur kids see me with this bag, they are beyond excited. They look forward to their meal every day. Very convenient way to feed raw.
customer_reviews.author: Xena's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Product arrived smash
customer_reviews.text: I would suggest buying this product in stores. I stopped purchasing from amazon because the product continuously arrived smashed and hard to measure for my dogs consumption. That being said, she does love this food and it’s good for her
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: An awful lot of crumbs
customer_reviews.text: A large percentage of the product ends up being dust and not nuggets, so the amount of usable food is about 3/4 (or less) of the package weight.
customer_reviews.author: D. Wilcox

customer_reviews.title: Package issues
customer_reviews.text: Product is exactly what breeder recommends but it was shipped in a soft side envelope which let the freeze dried nuggets get SMASHED in shipping. Not good.
customer_reviews.author: fay fay

customer_reviews.title: Burnt bites
customer_reviews.text: Hello! My most current purchase of the chicken and salmon dog treats seem to be burnt. They are hard, dark brown and smell burnt. I have attached a few pictures to show the product package and product. The last picture is a pellet from my old bag and the dark brown pellet from the new bag. Please help me understand if this is normal or perhaps the batch was over processed? I also tried to call but it says your voicemail is full?
customer_reviews.author: Angie Dean

customer_reviews.title: Great topper and travel food!
customer_reviews.text: My dog (German Shephard/Terrier Poodle Mix) is a picky eater. She will not eat her kibble alone, we crumble 2-5 pieces into her kibble each day and she licks the bowl until its all gone. When we are on a go with her, she will eat the cubes alone without a mess. They are healthy for her and make kibble more appealing. Also I noticed that it helps her pooping. I do wish it was a little less expensive but it is high quality. Also .. my dog will only eat the lamb or turkey flavor. The chicken and salmon gave her diarhea and the beef flavor cubes are too hard.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mix with a Little Hot Water to make up Gravy! Highly Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Had to order online we are on an extended stay with family & ran out.. Back home at our local pet store the owner told us to mix with a little hot water to make up gravy as not so dry... OUR DOG LOVES IT!
customer_reviews.author: Jodie T

customer_reviews.title: All powder no nuggets
customer_reviews.text: Iam not sure if it’s suppose to be like this but I have more than half of the bag all powder and less than half a bowl of nuggets. I already opened the bag so iam pretty sure I cannot return it but if I knew it was gonna be like this I wouldn’t of orderd it
customer_reviews.author: Yusuke

customer_reviews.title: my dogs love it
customer_reviews.text: my two dogs are picky eaters , I have brother and sister , I opened the bag I let them smell content they went crazy gumping arround whinnimg and barking with antisipation . they LOVE it end of story......
customer_reviews.author: tom shannon

customer_reviews.title: My dog seems to like this. I like the fact these are small
customer_reviews.text: Review on a different protein: chicken and salmon. When I opened the box, I thought the bag just had powder in it! A lot of them were crushed, but it must have happened before it was shipped since it came in a box with air bubbles. Not happy with that! Previous review on Lamb recipe. My dog seems to like this. I like the fact these are small.
customer_reviews.author: h a

customer_reviews.title: Used as a treat
customer_reviews.text: My pup loves these light flavorful freeze dried cubes. I use them as a training treat! He has never had allergies in part because he only gets lamb and no grains. Northwest Naturals is a great company and Amazon Prime is my pup's best friend after ME!😊
customer_reviews.author: Red Breast

customer_reviews.title: My two medium size dogs loves them
customer_reviews.text: They go crazy for this..This is my first time getting it and when I first got it I thought it look like poop but it turns out my dog love the taste of it and go crazy every single time I touch the bag
customer_reviews.author: BrianRex M

customer_reviews.title: Deliver more protected!!
customer_reviews.text: I completely DISLIKE that for the money, HALF the bag is powdered. Not ok!! Fur the money, figure out a way to have it delivered more protected!
customer_reviews.author: claire f.

customer_reviews.title: After numerous taste tests, this got first each time with my American Pit Bull Terrier
customer_reviews.text: I use this as a high reward treat for my dog on those difficult training exercises and also as her good night treat. I have a huge cabinet filled with treats and biscuits from all varieties. I picked her top 3 and laid them out in different orders varying distances from her nose and this was picked up first every time. I alternate between the flavors and she seems to love them all equally. Ingredients are pretty great too.
customer_reviews.author: KLucci

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves this lamb!
customer_reviews.text: Lamb Raw Rewards is a high quality product. My dog loves them. If they cost just a bit less, I'd use it as her primary food. Since she's a poor eater, I use these as healthy treats. They crumble easily as a topping on her regular food to encourage her to eat. Definitely a MUST at our house!
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Good Food
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves it. While it is a little pricey for the amount you get. My small hairy dog has stopped shedding. I think we are going to keep buying it. It is nice to be able to pick up our dog and not wear our dog too.
customer_reviews.author: Rpets

customer_reviews.title: Luv 'Em
customer_reviews.text: This product is very hard to find locally and online. My dogs go crazy for these treats and I must admit they do smell good. Northwest Naturals is just as high value as a hot dog for my dogs. The disadvantage is that they are more expensive than a hot dog, but the upside is that they are much more healthy for them. This is the only treat they always want.
customer_reviews.author: Tyrone Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: excellent product except for this order
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this food and she looks great--shiny coat and ideal weight I have ordered this product many times without quality issues, but a significant amount of the nuggets were crushed to powder. I am disappointed and hope it is not a trend.
customer_reviews.author: MaryAnn Wilson

customer_reviews.title: My 18 year old Jack Russel who is picky loves this
customer_reviews.text: My old dog loves this and she has always been fussy. It is a little pricey
customer_reviews.author: Marianne Pirotta

customer_reviews.title: This is my second time buying these. My dog ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time buying these. My dog loves then and the flavor. I use them as treats, it works.
customer_reviews.author: Rich G

customer_reviews.title: Chiquita loves the food!
customer_reviews.text: Too often bag has a lot of flakes instead of nuggets! Hard to decide how many flakes to give her. Improve that problem you have an excellent product, even though it seems a little pricey.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis H.

customer_reviews.title: Great product and great price!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product and my dog loves it too. I ordered a second bag.
customer_reviews.author: Hal K Kamigaki

customer_reviews.title: Our dogs love this food and its a wonderful convenience for us ...
customer_reviews.text: Our dogs love this food and its a wonderful convenience for us to have freeze dried food for them when we travel or as a back up when other food runs out. Both of them are on raw diets more or less and this has never seemed to give them tummy problems.
customer_reviews.author: aam

customer_reviews.title: Good product bad arrival condition
customer_reviews.text: I love the product but hate that it arrives crushed. I routinely crush it on top of my dogs food but this last bag arrived almost entirely crushed in powder. That's an unsatisfactory condition and i can't use it how I intended.
customer_reviews.author: susan

customer_reviews.title: Raw Freeze Dried Nuggets
customer_reviews.text: Both my cat and dachshund love these treats. They've also tried the beef and the lamb and this one seems to be their favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Matson

customer_reviews.title: Great for a picky eater
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this and we use it as a topper to get her to eat her kibble. Its too pricey to give her just this though.
customer_reviews.author: medea3

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I love these treats for my dogs dinner. I have a 6.5 dog who is very active but is extremely picky. I crumble these on top of cooked chicken and vegetables along with vitamin supplements and she is doing great. Sometimes she will just want them plain - I put them on a plate and she thinks they are treats. I switch between these and Stella and Chewys.
customer_reviews.author: thebgirl

customer_reviews.title: Nuggets don't hold up
customer_reviews.text: 1My fault, I didn't open immediately to do a return. The bulk of the package is dust...the nuggets just don't hold together. LOVE THE BEEF
customer_reviews.author: pkd

customer_reviews.title: not going to try them just for an Amazon review...
customer_reviews.text: I honestly have no idea if these taste good or not, and I am not going to try them just for an Amazon review, but damn, the dog loves them!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Roerick

customer_reviews.title: Good product but...
customer_reviews.text: very flaky, making it messy to prepare and not easy to determine feeding amount. Some cubes fall apart easily and some are like rocks.
customer_reviews.author: S Hill

customer_reviews.title: Dogs favorite
customer_reviews.text: My dog love these treats, she's older and doesn't have many teeth and they are tender enough for her mouth.
customer_reviews.author: Debra

customer_reviews.title: ... they're getting their special "astronaut food" they are so happy! Northwest Naturals is their absolute favorite
customer_reviews.text: When I tell my dogs they're getting their special "astronaut food" they are so happy! Northwest Naturals is their absolute favorite. My 3 pound mini-pom / chihuahua mix gets a noticeable increase in energy, too!
customer_reviews.author: Mermenet

customer_reviews.title: Great product but wrong product
customer_reviews.text: I really love the product but I’m frustrated that I was sent Lamb when I ordered Chicken. Normally I wouldn’t care and would just return it, but my pup was out of food and I was counting on feeding him this! Bummer
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pug likes it but expensive these raw food diets
customer_reviews.text: I use mini chopper to grind up to absorb warm water. Happy pug happy life
customer_reviews.author: Bk

customer_reviews.title: Stopped itching
customer_reviews.text: Yorkies has been on Blue food for many years. They love this. Stopped itching.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: ... and this has been the one he continues to enjoy. The small size bites also can be used ...
customer_reviews.text: My dog is a rather picky eater and this has been the one he continues to enjoy. The small size bites also can be used for a healthy treat. We’ve been buying this for more than a year now - always a great product
customer_reviews.author: Renée Williamson

customer_reviews.title: Picky eater rescue!
customer_reviews.text: We were buying another high quality freeze dried beef dog food and thought our girl was a picky eater...then we bought this. Everyday for 2 weeks she instantly scarfs it down. Excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Evans Howell

customer_reviews.title: All my dogs love these! I'm glad to find a place I ...
customer_reviews.text: All my dogs love these! I'm glad to find a place I can order them! I use them for treats but they can also be fed as a meal.
customer_reviews.author: Debi Klick

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love this food
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love NW Naturals, frozen or freeze dried, they don't care.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: I love this dog food but I recently ordered it and ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this dog food but I recently ordered it and when I opened the box the bag had a huge rip in it. The box was fine it was just placed in the box ripped and the food smelled like chemicals. I was very disappointed because I order it very regularly and I order it right before he runs out so I had to go buy some food from the store until I can get a new one sent to me.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan peugh

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Our GSP puppy loves this stuff!! The Lamb is her favorite I think! It is quite pricy but it’s the same price pretty much everywhere but it’s great quality!
customer_reviews.author: Amazonbuyer

customer_reviews.title: Up There With Stella & Chewy
customer_reviews.text: I buy my dog a variety of raw dog food. I've added this to the mix. It comes in bite-size squares which makes it easier for smaller dogs to consume. Dog likes it just fine.
customer_reviews.author: TravelGal

customer_reviews.title: Great rewards
customer_reviews.text: I love these treats because they break apart easily into smaller pieces and when I am giving my dogs lots of treats at trials/shows they do not get diarrhea from these treats.
customer_reviews.author: Kim K

customer_reviews.title: They all seem to like it!
customer_reviews.text: Introducing raw to my pack. They all seem to like it!
customer_reviews.author: CBH

customer_reviews.title: Loved by my dogs.
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love these for treats or on the road travel. A great option for the raw feeder on the road.
customer_reviews.author: Strange1

customer_reviews.title: Big hit with my little pups!
customer_reviews.text: These are a huge hit with my dogs. I mix them with their standard kibble and it all disappears. From reading about the product, it also seems to be well sourced and made in the USA.
customer_reviews.author: Christina J Weis

customer_reviews.title: My fussy dog loves it
customer_reviews.text: The nuggets are easy to handle and my dog finds them delicious.
customer_reviews.author: Jan H

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the product. Recommend. Dogs loved it and easy to portion the cubes for snacks or mini meals.
customer_reviews.author: Vanilla Salt

customer_reviews.title: My Dog Tells Me This is Delicious!
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves the beef and lamb flavors both. Didn't care for the poultry. I supplement with Fromm's dry dog food (grain free, of course!).
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Pickie pup loves these!!
customer_reviews.text: My puppy loves these crumbled on top of her dinner.!!
customer_reviews.author: Suzette M. Juhring

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are used as a treat. My dog likes them. So, I'll keep buying them.
customer_reviews.author: Rich G

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: My dog liked but they seemed to be a little dryer texture than alternatives brands.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Neater

customer_reviews.title: The dogs really loved this food
customer_reviews.text: The dogs really loved this food...we put just a bit of water on it and they are good to go....
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte A Carney

customer_reviews.title: My dogs can't get enough!
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love this product. I wish I could order more, but can't find it in stock anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Prendergast

customer_reviews.title: Beefy Good!!!
customer_reviews.text: I got my neice Terri (german shepard) these nuggets because my other babies loves these. She is also finicky and she loves these too! I know what Santa is getting for her for Christmas!!!
customer_reviews.author: crystaz

customer_reviews.title: He absolutely loved it so we now use it as a treat ...
customer_reviews.text: We originally got this for my Maltese after he had a bunch of teeth removed since it can be broken up and didn’t have to be chewed. He absolutely loved it so we now use it as a treat for him.
customer_reviews.author: J. Deaton

customer_reviews.title: but other than that my dog liked it.
customer_reviews.text: This particular bag out of 4 was crushed more, but other than that my dog liked it.
customer_reviews.author: jeff

customer_reviews.title: Great treats and food topper!
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves these. Easy to pack for trips and low calorie so my pup doesn't spoil his appetite! I also use these, crumbled up, as an added food topper.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Bag of crumbs
customer_reviews.text: The product came as a bag of crumbs :( and smelled "off"
customer_reviews.author: DoubleDdog

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel!
customer_reviews.text: My mini dachshund loves these. They're great for travel or treats. We keep some on hand in the pantry.
customer_reviews.author: Devon M

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy online
customer_reviews.text: This food I have been buying for years from mud bay where I moved recently does not have mud bay so I ordered online and this bag had hard pieces in every nugget could not break it down
customer_reviews.author: athina

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Product did not look anything like the photos.. just balls of sawdust.. based on weight, bag had 2 meals in it for 30 dollars. Buyer beware
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Great dog food
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this type of food. The freeze dried food is very high-quality
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No junk in the ingredients And my Maltese loves them
customer_reviews.text: My 13 yr old Maltese loves these. I feel good about giving them to her because they are packed with good nutrients and just a few of them are a complete meal for her.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff!
customer_reviews.text: My cats say these taste really great! Good for dogs, too. Made in the US, 100% chicken liver, no additives.
customer_reviews.author: Marc1

product_meta.title: Northwest Naturals Freeze Dried Raw Dog Food Nuggets, 12 oz.
product_meta.description: Flavor Name:BeefNorthwest Naturals freeze dried nuggets are formulated to meet the nutritional levels established by AAFCO dog food nutrient Profiles for all life stages. Northwest Naturals freeze dried nuggets are the same healthy formulas as our raw frozen diets, in freeze dried form. A complete and balanced grain-free formula combining the wholesome nutrition of muscle meat, organ meat, raw ground bone, fruits, and vegetables into a healthy, bio-available food that your pet will love!
feature_bullets: Raw, freeze dried beef recipe dog food
Made from 80 percent beef with no grains or gluten
Our freeze dried dog diets are an easier way to feed raw on the go because they don't need to be kept frozen
Feed as a nutritious supplement for injured or sick pets or crumble over your dog's kibble to make a tasty topping that's actually good for your pup
Made in the USA in a USDA/FDA inspected facility
